name: Donnie Arnold
description: Teaching person to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.

name: Andrea Chambers
description: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

name: Rebecca Wagner
description: Teachers have three loves: love of learning, love of learners, and the love of bringing the first two loves together.

name: Jean Allen
description: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.

name: Peggy Jimenez
description: I am not a teacher, but an awakener.

name: Allen Willis
description: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.

name: Beatrice Carter
description: To teach is to learn twice over.

name: Bertha Burgess
description: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.

name: Eleanor Edwards
description: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

name: Luis Dunn
description: They may forget what you said but they will not forget how you made them feel.

name: Frankie Oliver
description: All students can learn and succeed, but not in the same way and not in the same day.
